chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: nat -> Type
HP0: P 0
HP1: P 1
HPp: forall p : nat, prime p -> P p
HPm: forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y)
n: nat

Goal:
P n

Premises:
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall q : nat, q <d p -> q = 1 \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : nat ->...-> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : nat ->...-> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : nat ->...-> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : nat ->...-> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AF : [P : nat ->...-> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?TX : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?AA : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y ->...-> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?B : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Prop]

inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Type] ?B : [P : nat -> Type HP0 : P 0 HP1 : P 1 HPp : forall p : nat, prime p -> P p HPm : forall x y : nat, P x -> P y -> P (x * y) n : nat |- Prop]
